name: Easy EDD For Elementor – EDD Addon for Elementor. Make EDD more usable with Elementor.
author: Plugin Buffet

sections.description:
Easy EDD integration for Elementor helps to exhibit your store items with all the important data and blazes that can stand out. Your design comes true Easy EDD integration for Elementor makes it possible.
From now no more need to use shortcode for displaying the products. You can also display your selected product. More amazing thing is you can display your products by filtering them. If you have any
suggestion or have any queries please contact us.

Typography Design

Different types of products, different fonts and different typography styles. Create your font colors and customize them.

Unique Product button design

Style your product button in different colors you like as. This will highlight products that are looking gorgeous and amazing in other store products.

Smooth text colors

You can easily change the product name and color them as you wish. You can also customize product pricing color to what color you love.

Button border, hover, and hover text customize

Product hover border color, hover and hover text color and customize them easily.

What I can do with this?

You can accomplish almost any plan with your creative mind. You can customize your product in this EDD integration. So, You can download and customize your product page that is unique and beautiful design others product stores.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Just search for Easy EDD For Elementor in WordPress Plugin Repo and click install and activate.

OR

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/easy-edd-for-elementor directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do I need Elementor Pro to use this addon?

No, you can use this plugin within the free version of elementor.
sections.changelog:
8 Dec 2023 – 1.0.1

  • Added – Three different product slider
  • Improvements
  • In Progress – More widgets and improvements

24 Aug 2022 – 1.0.0

  • Product Widget
  • Selected Product Widget
  • Product Filtering Options
  • Product Templates
  • Styling Options
